While I have nothing against Canadians, I just thought
this was funny, and I do agree we in the US need to
pull out of Iraq and let the UN take over (I'm in the
Reform Party).  I live in Georgia, and wouldn't be
offended if you talked about Southern people in a
humorous way (although I wish I lived up North, love
hockey, hate southern accents, and think the only
thing red necks are good for is singing country music
which I consider the greatest form of music in the
world ironically).  Anyway, I won't do it again.

--- Nicolas Marion <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
> THis kind of speech is not to be seen again in NBW
> as it is an INTERNATIONAL 
> rpg.
> 
> I will not try to apologize for not going there, but
> let me explain my 
> fellow neighbours what Canadians saw that did not
> motivate helping you guys 
> going in Irak.
> 
> 1. We are a nation of thinkers and mediators.
> Conflicts are wasteful to us. 
> They waste money, resources and more importantly
> lives. Why fight when you 
> can talk it down?
> 
> 2. We saw the war in Irak as an opportunity to get
> more petroleum so the big 
> shots could continue screwing normal people. As it
> is right now, the cost of 
> gas has recently bursted up to a dollar a liter in
> just a few weeks! 
> Coincidence? I let you judge.
> 
> 3. Rumours go around that Iran put false information
> in US hands so they 
> could see Irak bulldozed, which it was. If that were
> true, US should be more 
> than ashamed of themselves and realize that being
> all military oriented 
> leaves them with no head to think.
> 
> I don't know what people of other countries think of
> it, but Canada never 
> saw any provocation by Irak that was worth a war and
> the death of hundreds 
> of people. If no one else does, I beg that God
> blesses the good people...
> 
> This was my personal comment and hopefully the last
> in this argument. I do 
> not want any other comment that disrespects ANYONE,
> be they US or other. We 
> are all equal on this planet and not even a
> president has the right to 
> bullshit the lowliest person that exists.
> 
>
